Headline: Pink Line Delays
ShortDescription: Pink Line trains are running w/residual delays following an earlier unauthorized person on the tracks at 47th. Service is resuming, allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Pink Line trains are running w/residual delays following an earlier unauthorized person on the tracks at 47th.

Some trains and platforms may be busier than usual as crews work to restore normal service.

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.
